body_html:
The error occurs on the worker with the visible GPU (V-100 in my case), but will also occur on a parameter server if I expose the GPU.
I use CUDA 9.0, ubuntu 16.04, and build with NCCL2.2 for cuda 9.0 in addition to GDR.
body_text:
The error occurs on the worker with the visible GPU (V-100 in my case), but will also occur on a parameter server if I expose the GPU.
I use CUDA 9.0, ubuntu 16.04, and build with NCCL2.2 for cuda 9.0 in addition to GDR.
body:
The error occurs on the worker with the visible GPU (V-100 in my case), but will also occur on a parameter server if I expose the GPU. 
I use CUDA 9.0, ubuntu 16.04, and build with NCCL2.2 for cuda 9.0 in addition to GDR.
